availability_constraints: Available full-time, key resource for architecture decisions.
risk_mitigation: RISK-005: Enforce pair programming on critical tasks (e.g., GSP integration) and document all architectural decisions.
alternative_allocation: Can be shifted to DevOps support in case of infrastructure emergencies.

skill_development_goals: Learn basic FastAPI for supporting microservices.
risk_mitigation: RISK-005: Document all OWL components and frontend architecture in Confluence. Conduct knowledge sharing sessions with backend team.
alternative_allocation: Can assist with simple Odoo backend tasks if frontend work is blocked.

skill_development_goals: Gain Odoo ORM proficiency to become a backup for the Odoo Lead.
risk_mitigation: Paired programming with Senior Backend Dev on initial Odoo tasks to accelerate learning.
alternative_allocation: Can be fully allocated to Odoo development after the GPS microservice is stable.

availability_constraints: 50% allocated to other projects, effective capacity is 32 hours/sprint.
risk_mitigation: RISK-004: Create comprehensive runbooks for deployment and disaster recovery. Automate all infrastructure changes via CI/CD.
alternative_allocation: Can be pulled in for security or performance troubleshooting as needed.
